character.statement: What happened?
Where did the thieves go?
And the genie?
Would you mind breaking this for me?
guess he won't be needing this.
I can't catch the genie without an enchanted vessel, and his true name!
I still can't catch the genie without knowing his true name!
I still can't catch the genie without an enchanted vessel!
I have the lamp and his true name, he won't be running this time!
I need to get up there first.
I've got you now Samhal, no more games!
Now where did he go this time?
Nothing left of the thieves' hideout.
Father?
I should try to make things right.
That's it! I'm going somewhere you'll never reach me!
You'll always be a step behind me!
That's what you think, first you'll have to find me!
Here he goes again. Maybe you have something that will help him see the light.
Maybe you have something that will help him see the light.
I think you already have what you need to set things right...
I've stolen my share of treasures from this dais... and now I'll take your soul!
Please, father, let me go!
Not everything...
Your wish is my command...
I never wanted the life of a princess, I wanted what we had before all this.
We lived simply then, but we were happy.
What more than power and riches could she possibly want? I don't understand!
Scheherazade! Stop!
Scheherazade, what have you done? All of our treasure is gone! We had everything we ever wanted!
We can get it back! Yes, you have the power to get our riches back!
Why are you showing me this?
You haven't shown me anything!
What's this?
Oh i've been so blind!
Scheherazade, I'm sorry. I've been so foolish. But now I know how to fix everything.
Thank you, [PLAYER_NAME]. Before I make my wish would you like to make one, for all of your help?

exchange.question: I wish to have a robot army of butlers!
I wish to be able to speak to animals!
I wish to be the worlds best banjo player!

character.statement: A fine choice. As for me...
My greed made me forget what was truly valuable. I wish that I'd never found the lamp in the first place.
I thought you were a goner for sure! That whole cave system collapsed just as I got you out.
They scattered like scarabs in torchlight.
The whole town's got genie fever! Maybe the sultan will know what to do.
If only i were younger, i'd be out looking for that genie too!

exchange.question: What happened to you?
exchange.answer: I wished to be young again.

exchange.question: Well, I guess you got your wish...
exchange.answer: You'd think I might have predicted this ironic outcome with my hard-won wisdom.

character.statement: This compass supposedly points to the genie. I'll find him no matter where he hides!
This compass is useless. It's spinning like a top!
This is a huge waste of time. I'm going to get back to work inventing Algebra.

exchange.question: Hey, you're that big tough henchman.
exchange.answer: Not anymore. The master thief kicked me out. Said I was useless now.

exchange.question: Why is that?
exchange.answer: Everything I touch falls apart! I couldn't enforce a ham sandwich at this point.

exchange.question: What are you doing out here?
exchange.answer: I'll be safe in the desert. Can't break sand, right?

character.statement: Finally, a chance to be useful again!
If you need anything else pulverized, bring it to me.
